answers.answer: Thanks dear.That was really encouraging.I hope i too have a day in my life when i can announce that i am pregnant.
bani29waiting too to announce that I am pregannt, can't wait for that day
Wish you good luck.For how long have you been ttc?For me its 9 months with no success.....
bani I  have been trying for over 2 years now.Good luck to you.

Thanks for the stories I too hope I can announce soon I am preg. again.  But I dread that day also.   I will be scared I will lose yet another child.  I think if and when I am able I will wait til I am quite sure it will all be ok.

question: I have so many very close friends who were ttc. One was very underweight and had pco's. She went through a procedure called ovarian diathermy, she was on clomid. A day before she was going to have artifical insemination, the nurse asked her to do a pregnancy test. She thought oh it is going to be neg cause the ovulation monitor showed that she did not ovulate that month. But guess what she was pregnant, she had been trying for over 2 years. She has 2 boys now ages 3 1/2 and 1 1/2.Another  friend from school was diagnosed with PCO's and she was overweight, she had been trying to get preg for over a year. The doc asked to get on metformin and clomid  and guess what, she got pregnant on her own, the preg test had a faint line, her hcg levels were low and she had to get injections. She went on to have a good pregnancy, she did have gestational diabetes during her preg. She has a 11 month old boy.It is unbelieveable how many people I have met with infertility issues. MY obgyn as well went through infertility treatment and has twins. My dermatologist as well went through treatment, she must have just delivered her baby.
title: Encouraging Stories for those TTC
